OG.content: [quotes re: book of Nature]
OG.linkedContent: [quotes re: book of Nature]

OG.content: natural writing (breath) pneumatological not grammatological
OG.linkedContent: natural writing (breath) pneumatological not grammatological

OG.content: interior holy voice of faith; natural law, native unity of voice & writing is prescriptive, commandment > good writing comprehended as that which had to be comprehended
OG.linkedContent: interior holy voice of faith; natural law, native unity of voice & writing is prescriptive, commandment > good writing comprehended as that which had to be comprehended

OG.content: for Saussure, true, natural bond is that of sound & signified (not visible image of writing)
OG.linkedContent: for Saussure, true, natural bond is that of sound & signified (not visible image of writing)

OG.content: for Hegel & Saussure, “symbols”: the only natural signs, only signs that escape semiology as grammatology
OG.linkedContent: for Hegel & Saussure, “symbols”: the only natural signs, only signs that escape semiology as grammatology

OG.content: writing: absence of signatory/referent, a “fixité” different from speech’s, a monstrosity, écart naturel dans la nature > must contain it like a leper
OG.linkedContent: writing: absence of signatory/referent, a “fixité” different from speech’s, a monstrosity, écart naturel dans la nature > must contain it like a leper

OG.content: physis’ “others”: art, technology, law, institution, society, immotivation, arbitrariness, etc.
OG.linkedContent: physis’ “others”: art, technology, law, institution, society, immotivation, arbitrariness, etc.

OG.content: Rousseau & Lévi-Strauss on books piling, filled w/ lies; book of nature: look, don’t read
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau & Lévi-Strauss on books piling, filled w/ lies; book of nature: look, don’t read

OG.content: Rousseau advocates a kind of natural supplement w/ culture, a suppléance, habit, pedagogy, as necessary and insufficient to reconstitute wholeness of mother nature
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau advocates a kind of natural supplement w/ culture, a suppléance, habit, pedagogy, as necessary and insufficient to reconstitute wholeness of mother nature

OG.content: childhood first call for suppléance, first manifestation of deficiency, pedagogy crudely shows the paradox of supplement
OG.linkedContent: childhood first call for suppléance, first manifestation of deficiency, pedagogy crudely shows the paradox of supplement

OG.content: slow place of pedagogy, Nature takes her time, outpaced by immediacy of dangerous supplement which burns the halting points (brûle les étapes), consumes l’énergie sans retour
OG.linkedContent: slow place of pedagogy, Nature takes her time, outpaced by immediacy of dangerous supplement which burns the halting points (brûle les étapes), consumes l’énergie sans retour

OG.content: origin/nature as myth of addition, supplementarity annulled by being purely additive > myth of the effacement of the trace
OG.linkedContent: origin/nature as myth of addition, supplementarity annulled by being purely additive > myth of the effacement of the trace

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] cet être-dans-la-nature a donc le mode d’être étrange du supplément: l’être-dans makes classical logic tremble
OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] cet être-dans-la-nature a donc le mode d’être étrange du supplément: l’être-dans makes classical logic tremble

OG.content: nature as limit concept—impossible equilibrium btwn reserve & desire, imagination breaks equilibrium, desire must leave its reserve; acc. Rousseau, ethics: to come closest to this limit
OG.linkedContent: nature as limit concept—impossible equilibrium btwn reserve & desire, imagination breaks equilibrium, desire must leave its reserve; acc. Rousseau, ethics: to come closest to this limit

OG.content: via Rousseau, exceed nature, then return to it, imitate it, but keep a minimal (almost nil) difference > nature as ailleurs, archeo-teleologic, alibi (elsewhere in space), in illo tempore (elsewhere in time)
OG.linkedContent: via Rousseau, exceed nature, then return to it, imitate it, but keep a minimal (almost nil) difference > nature as ailleurs, archeo-teleologic, alibi (elsewhere in space), in illo tempore (elsewhere in time)

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] in an archeoteleological concept of nature [eg. identification of word & song, avant et afin]: modification becomes one w/ substance it modifies: (nature & its other, archeology & eschatology, substance & mode, origin & genesis) > this logic wreaks havoc on juridical/methodological point of view, annuls difference btwn structural/genetic point of view
OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] in an archeoteleological concept of nature [eg. identification of word & song, avant et afin]: modification becomes one w/ substance it modifies: (nature & its other, archeology & eschatology, substance & mode, origin & genesis) > this logic wreaks havoc on juridical/methodological point of view, annuls difference btwn structural/genetic point of view

OG.content: natural immediacy is à la fois origine et fin, in the double sense of birth & death, unfinished sketch and finished perfection (esquisse inachevée et perfection finie) [how Rousseau’s contradiction is only apparent, how his law of concept of nature constrains natural law]
OG.linkedContent: natural immediacy is à la fois origine et fin, in the double sense of birth & death, unfinished sketch and finished perfection (esquisse inachevée et perfection finie) [how Rousseau’s contradiction is only apparent, how his law of concept of nature constrains natural law]

OG.content: mute sign is sign of liberty when it is immediate, no detour, no anonymity (the expresser and expressed are properly present), mute sign is sign of slavery when re-presentative mediacy invades system (abyss of circulation sans fin, no one there for anyone, not even himself) > presuming speech opened this abyss, Rousseau tempted to return to archeological moment of sign w/out speech
OG.linkedContent: mute sign is sign of liberty when it is immediate, no detour, no anonymity (the expresser and expressed are properly present), mute sign is sign of slavery when re-presentative mediacy invades system (abyss of circulation sans fin, no one there for anyone, not even himself) > presuming speech opened this abyss, Rousseau tempted to return to archeological moment of sign w/out speech

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] teleology as external—passage from state of nature to state of language (from one structure to another) explained by catastrophic archaeology (catastrophe of dangerous supplementarity)
OG.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Rousseau] teleology as external—passage from state of nature to state of language (from one structure to another) explained by catastrophic archaeology (catastrophe of dangerous supplementarity)

OG.content: is the catastrophe that splits nature still natural?
OG.linkedContent: is the catastrophe that splits nature still natural?

OG.content: passage from nature to society can’t be described by alternative genesis/structure; advent of supplementarity as natural catastrophe neither in nor out of nature [Aristotle]: nonrational origin of reason
OG.linkedContent: passage from nature to society can’t be described by alternative genesis/structure; advent of supplementarity as natural catastrophe neither in nor out of nature [Aristotle]: nonrational origin of reason

OG.content: for Rousseau, what never should have arrived, did [i.e. the supplement]; for Plato, for all onto-theology, meaning put out of play (le sens est mis hors jeu) in condemnation of art > Rousseau does not affirm (play/game of) writing but resigns himself to it
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, what never should have arrived, did [i.e. the supplement]; for Plato, for all onto-theology, meaning put out of play (le sens est mis hors jeu) in condemnation of art > Rousseau does not affirm (play/game of) writing but resigns himself to it

OG.content: society born by accident to repair the accidental catastrophe (Fall) [birth of supplement] of nature
OG.linkedContent: society born by accident to repair the accidental catastrophe (Fall) [birth of supplement] of nature
